Sebastien Lambla wrote:
> The original URLs used + as a shorthand for spaces in querystrings. 
> Browsers still implement this feature. Sadly, neither http nor html 
> (except for app/www-url-formencoded used as querystring in the HTML5 
> spec) imply this should still apply.


Where else would application/www-url-formencoded be defined?
